name: rectangle
description: The rectangle operation provides the function of OpenCV rectangle, and allows you to put a rectangle into your pipeline image.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x-coordinate of the left edge of the rectangle. FireSight: If -1, center the rectangle horizontally

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y-coordinate of the top edge of the rectangle. FireSight: If -1, center the rectangle vertically

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the rectangle. FireSight: Default is 64.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The width of the rectangle. FireSight: Default is 64.

parameters.name: fill
parameters.description: FireSight: JSON array of BGR color to fill rectangle. Default is [-1,-1,-1] for no fill.

parameters.name: flood
parameters.description: Color for outside of rectangle. Default is [-1,-1,-1] for no flood.

parameters.name: shift
parameters.description: Number of fractional bits in the point coordinates.
